name: the one who is almost a castaway
description:
A representation of the moment before everything falls apart and you get lost, a wreck of external situations.

A representation of impermanence.

As Rinpoche says

''Again, don't ignore impermanence. Whatever seems to be a priority in your life is actually quite temporary. Come and go. Nothing is reliable.''

Spray NOU and oil pastels on Canson 200g/m2.
2021

by ZALA
